name: Portland Internetworks
description: What does Portland Internetworks do? Well, in short, we do anything related to IT support, and we do it especially for businesses. We offer Co-Managed IT or Fully Managed Services, network architecture, collocation, and wireless access to phone systems, hardware/software sales, telecom agent services, and POS support, which means you have one 24/7 team to cover all of your tech-related needs. It's efficient for you, and we get to do what we love to do.
